item.description:
Do you really want to find out 10 years from now that all along you have been missing out on your favorite beer when you can find out now?
John Harvard's brewery 33Dunster St. in Cambridge offers beer tasting, (5) 5-oz beer varieties for approx. $5.89. That's 25 oz! They also have pitchers which we can share! There is no pressure to eat if you sit near the bar at the "long group table in the bar area with stools (which can accommodate a large group). Delicious appetizers and bar menu is available here.

Important Note: If you are interested in ordering flights...plan on getting there early. It takes time to prepare the "flights" so if some of you can show up earlier ( in order to stagger the service) that will alievate processing time for our flight orders. Since they fill up fast on Saturday, expect delays after 5PM . If anyone can help by getting there by 4:40 PM, please grab a stool at the giant pub table in the bar. Late arrivals, except ldelays on ordering flights. Pitchers of beer are readily available.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be seated in the bar area at the long group pub table
item.name: RAINY DAY ?????Beer Flights @ John Harvard's Brewery of course!
